message.body: Hey Kennedy! I just got your email, ill definitely be able to be your friends lighting board guy. Can you throw me her number? I don't think ill be able
to film your show though, my dslr isn't good for long term recording and I don't have the right lens for it.
Id rent a proper camera from my school but its closed for rentals until october. Sorry :( ill try to find someone else who can though
Hi! Im having a bit of an internet emergency and I lost the wifi password. Could you be my hero and throw it at me? Ill give you guys cash for the past c
And no worries! Just slip it under the door. Hope you can make it out to our show next week!0
Hey, I just saw your post on facebook do you need any assistance for your show tomorrow?
Thank you! I took a lot of pain meds and got thru yesterday, and feeling much better today. But thanks! Hope you can come see it!
What's the address and time? Well be there

Hey, Paige and I just slipped some cash under your door for Internet. The network disappeared. Did anything change with it?
Thanks, -Jason
Heya, we're camping, don't have phone service consistently. Dunno what's wrong with the net, sorry :-( we'll be back and can fix on Monday. Thx for the payment!
Internet should be back, just needed to be reset, sorry bout that!
